function.name: pspell_add_to_personal
function.description: Add the word to a personal wordlist.

function.name: pspell_add_to_session
function.description: Add the word to the wordlist in the current session.

function.name: pspell_config_create
function.description: Create a config used to open a dictionary.

function.name: pspell_config_ignore
function.description: Ignore words less than N characters long.

function.name: pspell_config_mode
function.description: Change the mode number of suggestions returned.

function.name: pspell_config_personal
function.description: Set a file that contains personal wordlist.

function.name: pspell_config_repl
function.description: Set a file that contains replacement pairs.

function.name: pspell_config_runtogether
function.description: Consider run-together words as valid compounds.

function.name: pspell_config_save_repl
function.description: Determine whether to save a replacement pairs list along with the wordlist.

function.name: pspell_new_config
function.description: Load a new dictionary with settings based on a given config.

function.name: pspell_new_personal
function.description: Load a new dictionary with personal wordlist.

function.name: pspell_save_wordlist
function.description: Save the personal wordlist to a file.

function.name: pspell_store_replacement
function.description: Store a replacement pair for a word.

function.name: pspell_config_dict_dir
function.description: Location of the main word list.
